title: Demon's Bride
description: Ivy is kidnapped away from her parents when she was a child, because she is perfect, physically and genetically. She’s brought to a home for girls to wait for their demon husbands. The demons come and let their heart choose their wife. When the third highest demon arrives at the orphanage for brides, he knows that his bride is here. He can feel her presence. He won’t have to search the planet for her. The wedding ceremony is preformed immediately in the cellar altar room by the high priestess. If Ivy isn’t a virgin, she will die by the priestess’s own hand. Ivy passes the test, and the ceremony continues. Killian is very pleased with his virgin bride. He takes her to his home after they are married. Within a short time, he falls deeply in love with her. Ivy whispers into Killian’s ear about goodness and sunlight. At first, Killian dismisses her ideas, but when he starts to do research, he finds out that the Great Master is given the choice to either do good or evil at the beginning of his reign. The change has to take place on All Hollows' Eve. Will Killian start a war to give the woman he loves what she longs for or will he let evil continue to reign? Ages 18 and up. This is a Dark Paranormal Erotica Spanking Romance was written especially for Halloween.
author: Rachel Burns
